description: Students explore a specified topic or theme in language, in literature, or in
culture/civilization, or in a combination of these, through close reading, discussion, analysis,
and interpretation of selected literary and/or non-literary works.  Recent topics include
"War and Terrorism," "Crime and Memory in Fiction," and "Translation Studies." May be
repeated if topic is different.  Taught in French. Offered annually. Prerequisite: minimum of one
